data.title: Save stories in News on iPhone
data.meta_description: In News on iPhone, save stories to read later.
data.text:
Clear everything: Tap Clear, then tap Clear All.

Your News history, recommendation information, saved stories, and downloaded issues and audio stories are removed from all your devices where you’re signed in with the same Apple ID.

Note: Story titles remain in Saved Stories, but you must be online to read the stories.

If you clear recommendations, and Show in App is on in Settings > News > Siri & Search, recommendations based on your Safari and app usage and your reading habits in News are cleared. To prevent News from suggesting stories based on your Safari and app usage, turn off Show in App.
